detailed_findings.applied_text: Note: 0.02ms represents sample-level precision at 44.1kHz ([SPEC016 DBD-DEC-080]). For tick-level precision (~35.4 nanoseconds), see [SPEC017 Tick Rate - SRC-TICK-030].

detailed_findings.notes: Reference embedded in component description as specified
